sentences.sentence: Finding this condition may require tests other than an angiogram.
sentences.translation: 这种情况可能需要血管造影测试才能发现。

sentences.sentence: An angiogram shows the location and severity of blockages in blood vessels.
sentences.translation: 冠状动脉造影能够显示血管内的阻塞位置以及阻塞的严重程度。

sentences.sentence: So even if a woman gets an all clear from an angiogram, she should get treatment if she has symptoms.
sentences.translation: 所以即使一位女性血管造影的结果没有问题，如果她有症状，也要接受治疗。
